New Records: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 23 points, 17 rebounds, and 15 assists.
The Nuggets finished 21 of 21 from the free throw line.
The Nuggets set a season-high in assists with 44.
Key Match Events: The Nuggets had a 39-14 run in the third quarter.
Trae Young was called for a technical foul, and De'Andre Hunter was called for a technical foul.
Post-Match Reflections: The Nuggets won their third straight game and started a busy 17-game month on the right note.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the Nuggets' second win against the Hawks this season.
Young has five or more assists in 193 straight regular season games.
